headline: You are seen
description: A drawing and reflection revealing the theme of illumination and witness, where tangled forms give way to light and the affirmation 'You are seen.' It belongs to the Sun Through Branches phase, marked by revelation and protective illumination.

motifMap.meaning: Revelation, divine illumination, the sense of being witnessed within shadow
motifMap.position: upper center and radiating through the drawing

motifMap.meaning: The density of thought, memory, and confusion giving way to clarity
Affirmation of recognition, both divine and human

associatedMedia.description: Hand-drawn artwork of tangled lines and shapes illuminated by beams of light, with the phrase 'YOU ARE SEEN' written within the composition.

fieldDefinitions.headline: Title of the piece
fieldDefinitions.description: Plain summary of the content’s purpose

fieldDefinitions.timeFelt: When and under what phase it was felt
